midweek.heading: Midweek Groups
paragraphs: We encourage anyone part of our church family to find transformation, discipleship, and growth in a small community.
Most of our communities meet weekly to study God's Word, pray, and encourage one another in faith.
To join a community, visit Park Communities or contact us.

kids.heading: Kids
paragraphs: We have kids groups (ages 1-11) that meet during our Sunday gathering. Speak to our welcome team to find out more.
Find out more about Park Kids.

youth.heading: Youth (Cornerstone)
paragraphs: Our youth group Cornerstone meets every Wednesday at church from 6:00-7:00pm. If you are at secondary school, we would love to see you there.
We also run a youth Bible study during selected Sunday gatherings for Years 7-10.
Find out more about Park Youth.
